suite.name: TC1 getcurrentdata

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://api.openweathermap.org/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects

kw.doc: This custom keyword will help in finding AllureReports directory and empties it if exists

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Directory Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given path points to an existing directory.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.
